ComicInfo.Title: International Incident Part 4: "All My Sins Remembered"
ComicInfo.Summary: 4 different covers published this issue. Special thanks to Hasbro's Aaron Archer, Michael Kelly, Amie Lozanski, Val Roca, Ed Lane, Michael Provost, Erin Hillman, Jos Huxley, Samantha Lomow, and Michael Verrechia for their invaluable assistance.International Incident Part 4: "All My Sins Remembered": Onslaught begins a battle in China's outer border between the Predacons and Autobots (sent to capture the Combaticons in North Korea) led by Prime. In between the battle, Thundercracker destroys the 2 energon processing plants in China and North Korea, while Cosmos defuses a nuclear bomb aimed by Russia towards the fighting groups. The battle is broadcasted worldwide, and Bumblebee sets up a press conference to reveal what's been going on afterwards, but is shot by a human assassin before he can complete the conference. To be continued...
